name: Carve Cube
description: Carve cube  is an endless runner game. The main goal of the game is to carve the grid in front to the player to fit the cubes coming at you. You will hit the "G" key to active "Grid Carve" this will let you make a blueprint of what you want carved out. Then you hit G to confirm the carve. It does not have a lot of features just yet. But I will add a lot more soon.
